selectedVerses.text: "Zebulun shall dwell at the shore of the sea; he shall become a haven for ships, and his border shall be at Sidon.
Just as day was breaking, Jesus stood on the shore; yet the disciples did not know that it was Jesus.
Then Solomon went to Ezion-geber and Eloth on the shore of the sea, in the land of Edom.
Now when the south wind blew gently, supposing that they had obtained their purpose, they weighed anchor and sailed along Crete, close to the shore.
King Solomon built a fleet of ships at Ezion-geber, which is near Eloth on the shore of the Red Sea, in the land of Edom.
